features.title: User Registration & Onboarding
features.description: Streamlined digital account creation with identity verification and multi-factor authentication. Supports both personal and business account types.
acceptanceCriteria: Complete registration within 10 minutes
Support document upload for KYC
Instant account number generation

features.title: Account Dashboard
features.description: Centralized view of account balances, recent transactions, and financial insights. Provides real-time spending analysis and financial health indicators.
acceptanceCriteria: Display current balance prominently
Show last 30 days of transactions
Categorize spending automatically

features.title: Fund Transfer & Payments
features.description: Secure inter-account and external transfers with instant transaction tracking. Supports domestic and international money movement.
acceptanceCriteria: Real-time transfer confirmation
Support multiple payment methods
Transaction fee transparency

features.title: Mobile Check Deposit
features.description: Enable customers to deposit checks by capturing images through mobile app. Implements advanced image verification and fraud detection.
acceptanceCriteria: Support check image upload
Instant preliminary deposit
48-hour verification process

features.title: Security & Fraud Monitoring
features.description: Advanced machine learning-powered fraud detection system. Provides real-time transaction alerts and instant card freezing capabilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect suspicious transaction patterns
Send instant SMS/email alerts
One-click card lock/unlock

features.title: Investment & Savings Tools
features.description: Integrated robo-advisory platform for automated investment recommendations. Offers goal-based savings plans and investment tracking.
acceptanceCriteria: Risk profile assessment
Automated portfolio rebalancing
Performance tracking dashboard

features.title: Compliance & Reporting
features.description: Comprehensive reporting for tax purposes and regulatory compliance. Generates standardized financial statements and transaction logs.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate annual tax documents
Support multiple currency reporting
Secure document archival

features.title: API & Third-Party Integrations
features.description: Open banking API allowing secure connections with accounting software, financial planning tools, and payment platforms. Supports OAuth authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: Standardized API documentation
Granular permission controls
Real-time data synchronization

stories.userStory: As a platform engineer, I need user registration & onboarding capabilities so that the solution stays reliable.
acceptanceCriteria: Given the user registration & onboarding service is provisioned, when a workload executes, then end-to-end tracing is captured.
Given deployment pipelines run for user registration & onboarding, when artifacts are promoted, then infrastructure policies pass.
Given observability hooks are enabled, when user registration & onboarding integrates with downstream systems, then alerts trigger within service budgets.
implementationNotes: Outline modules, interfaces, and data contracts for the user registration & onboarding stack.
Integrate shared authentication, logging, and metrics components.
Automate integration tests covering API, data, and messaging flows.
